terms.name: Duration of repairs if insurer nominated repairer used
Extends Third Party liability to another vehicle

Replace vehicle new for old subject to:
 •	Repairs exceeding 60% of value
 •	You are the only registered keeper
 •	vehicle under one year old
 •	available immediately.
NCD Unaffected and no excess paid

endorsements.endorsementTitle: E31 - Double voluntary and compulsory excess/es
endorsements.endorsementDescription: If you don't use one of our nominated repairers to repair your car when making a claim under sections 1 or 2 of your policy, the excess/es on your schedule will be doubled.
